270353.「いやったぁああああああ！\n 見えるっ！ 見えるぞーっ！！\n あっりがと～う:
E-yessssssssss! Look, just look!
Thank you so much! Spring-a-
ling, you're the best!!!

270356.「お待ちしてましたよ～～～！！\n <pc>さん！:
Oh, <pc>!
I've been waiting for you!!!

270359.「世紀の！ 新発見を～～～っ！！:
...have made a new discovery of the
century!!!

270360.「増殖する魔獣どころの騒ぎじゃ ありません！\n 見てください あの浮遊都市っ！:
This is no mere uproar caused by multiplying
beasts! Look, it's a floating city! A
marvelous, amazing new discovery!!

270361.「私が 発見した あの浮遊都市！\n しかし アストルティアに出現するのは\n:
That floating city was my discovery!
However, this isn't the first time that
it's appeared in Astoltia!

270362.「アストルティアの歴史を ひもとくと\n 突然 空に 巨大な町が出現した……だと:
Astoltia's history claims that a giant city
had appeared in the sky once...a mystical
city in the heavens, they say...

270363.「時代や 種族 地域を問わず\n たいへん 似かよった伝説が\n 残されているこ:
I found that this legend has been passed
down throughout time periods, races, and
regions alike!

270364.「浮遊都市の出現は たいてい\n その種族や 文明が 滅亡の危機を乗り越え\n:
The floating city's appearance seems to occur
whenever some race or civilization overcomes
extinction and achieves peace...

270365.「そのため 多くの伝説では 浮遊都市とは\n 神々の使いであり 平和を勝ち取った:
The many legends say that the floating city is
the messenger of the gods, here to
congratulate and bless those who found peace!

270366.「つまりっ！ <pc>さんが\n アストルティアを救った このタイミングで！\n:
And that means...! Perfect timing! You saved
Astoltia mere moments ago, and so the floating
city has revealed itself!

270367.「まさにっ！\n 伝説と そっくり同じなのです！！\n 我々は 新たな伝説に 立:
Indeed! Just like the legends said! We are
witnessing the birth of a new legend!

270368.「……はぁ はぁ。\n 申し訳ありません つい 興奮してしまって。:
Huff, puff... Sorry about that. I got a bit
carried away there...

270369.「さらに さらにですよ！！\n あの 浮遊都市を描いた 古い絵画には\n 不思議:
And that's not all! Those old paintings that
depict the floating city show strange beings!

270370.「現在も 浮遊都市に 生物は存在するのか？\n 存在するとしたら いったい 何者:
Does life still exist in that city? If so,
what could they possibly be like? Do
they have a connection to us?!

270371.「一刻も早く 調査に 向かいたいのですが\n 新発明『飛び飛びピョン太くん』を:
I'd like to go right away as to investigate,
but even my brand new invention, the
"Spring-a-ling", can't reach that high!

270372.「そこで！ 私が 知るかぎり\n 世界最高の 身体能力を持つ あなたに！\n ご:
And so! As the most physically gifted person
in the entire world that I know, I really need
your help!

270373.「お願いです！ <pc>さんっ！！\n 飛び飛びピョン太くんで 浮遊都市まで\n:
I'm begging you, <pc>!!
Please use the Spring-a-ling and jump to
that floating city!<yesno><close>

270374.「この 新発見で アストルティアの歴史は\n 大きく変わるかもしれない！\n ど:
This new discovery could change the course of
Astoltia's history forever! I'm begging you!
Please jump up to the floating city!<yesno><close>

270375.「ありがとうございますっ！\n さあさあっ ぽーんと！ ぴょーんと！\n 浮遊都:
Thank you kindly! Come on! With a boing and
a woosh, jump high to that floating city!!

270376.<pc>は パルミオ博士の発明品\n飛び飛びピョン太くんに 乗って\n空高く ジ:
<pc> jumps high into the sky on Dr.
Palmio's invention, the Spring-a-ling!

270377.「だめでしたか……。私の計算では\n <pc>さんの 身体能力なら\n 浮遊都市:
I guess it wasn't enough...by my calculations,
your physical capabilities should be able to
reach up that high...

270378.「いや……飛び飛びピョン太くんが\n ダメでも これなら……！:
No...if even the Spring-a-ling couldn't do
it, then...

270379.「さあっ！ 新しい発明のために\n この メモの材料を 集めてきてください！:
All right! I need you to go and gather the
materials on this note for my new invention!

270380.<pc>は パルミオ博士から\nパルミオのメモ（だいじなもの）を\n押しつけられ:
<pc> was forced by Dr. Palmio to
take Palmio's Note (Key Item)!<me 60>

270382.しかし パルミオのメモは\n途中から なぐり書きになっていて\n最後のほうは よ:
However, the contents of the note became
quite scribbled halfway through, making
the rest very difficult to read...

270383.「私は あきらめません！\n 我が人生 最大の新発見！ 浮遊都市の謎を\n 必ず:
I will not give up! The greatest discovery of
my life is right in front of me! I will solve
the mystery of that city with my own hands!

270384.「どうしました？ <pc>さん！\n 頼んだ材料を 急いで集めてきてください！\:
What's the matter, <pc>? Please
hurry and gather those materials for me!
*mumble, mumble*...to increase distance...

270385.「何か わからないことが あったら\n 愛しい妻 ペコリアに 聞いてください！\:
If you find yourself stuck, feel free to ask
my wife, Pekoria! She'll be in the well
near the Wondrous Windmill Tower!

270386.「浮遊都市に 到達するためには\n メモの材料が 必要なんですっ！\n どうか:
I really need those materials if we're to
reach that floating city! I'm really counting
on you!!

270388.「ありがとうございます！\n <pc>さんっ！\n 集めていただいた 材料さえ:
Thank you so much, <pc>!
Now with those materials you gathered
for me...

270390.パルミオ博士は <pc>が\n集めてきた材料で\nまんじゅうを 作りあげた！:
Dr. Palmio created a bun out of the
materials that <pc> had gathered
for him!

270391.「カロリーひかえめ 甘さたっぷり\n 疲れ スッキリ スパイシー！\n その名も:
Low in calories...sweet...relaxing...
refreshing...and spicy to boot!! I
shall name it...the Palmio Pastry!!

270392.「最近 私が開発した\n 新発明・新発見 サポート食品なんですよ！\n これさえ:
I recently developed this new invention,
this new discoveryーa comfort food, if you
will! Eat it, and you'll be a hundred strong!

270393.「うんまぁあああああああいいっ！\n 何度 食べても おいしさ新発見だっ！:
Yummmmmmmm! No matter how many times I eat it,
I always find something new to enjoy!

270394.「……きた きた きたーっ！\n 頭の回転が よくなって きましたよーっ！\n:
...Yes, yes, yes! The haze is finally
clearing! Now, feast your eyes on this!

270395.パルミオ博士は またたく間に\n傘のようなものを 作りあげた！:
In what seemed like an instant, Dr. Palmio
creates what looks to be some kind of
umbrella!

270396.「いやったぁあああああ！！\n 新発明『ハイ！ ハイ！ ジャンプさん』\n 完成:
E-yessssssssssss! My new invention, the Sky
High Umbrella, is completed!!!!

270398.<pc>は パルミオ博士から\nハイ！ ハイ！ ジャンプさんを\n受け取った！:
<pc> received a Sky High Umbrella
from Dr. Palmio!

270399.「この ハイ！ ハイ！ ジャンプさんなら\n はるか 浮遊都市まで ひとっ飛びで:
My brilliant Sky High Umbrella can fly us all
the way up to that floating city!

270400.「では 大空の旅へ 出発しましょう！: Come on! It's time to go sky high!

270402.「やりましたよ！ <pc>さんっ！\n アストルティアの歴史に 秘められた最大の:
I've really done it this time! The greatest
mystery in Astoltia's entire history is just
around the corner!

270403.「もちろん 浮遊都市への 最初の１歩は\n あなたに おゆずりしますよ！\n そ:
Of course, I'll let you take the first step
into the city proper! In exchange, I get
to name it!!

270404.「おおっ！ 浮遊都市には やはり\n 生物が 存在しているようですねっ！！:
Ohh! It seems there still exist some
creatures that reside in the city!!

270405.「あの生物……個体の大きさは 人間並み。\n エルフ同様 背に 羽が生えているが:
It's about the size of a human...has wings
on its back like an Elf...but their shape and
function seem to be different...?

270406.「いやったぁああああ！\n 新生物 発見だぁ……:
E-yessssssssssss!! We've found a new being
that we can study...

270410.「あの 新生物！ 道具まで 使うなんて！\n ぜひとも 雌雄１匹ずつ 捕まえて\:
I can hardly believe these new beings are
using tools! I'd love to take back a male and
female and study them!

270411.「あぁ～～っ！ 来て よかったぁーっ！\n こんな エキサイティングな新発見が\:
Ohhhhh, I'm so happy I came here! To think
that I could make such an exciting new
discovery...how exhilarating!!

270412.「うわーっ！！\n ハイ！ ハイ！ ジャンプさんがーっ！？\n <pc>さん！:
Ahhhh!!! My Sky High Umbrella!!!
<pc>!! Help meeeeeee!!

270414.「この気温と湿度……\n オーグリード大陸 北部のようですね……？:
This temperature, this humidity...I believe we
are on the northern end of Ogreed...?

270416.「いやったぁあああああ！\n さっきのは 夢じゃ なかったんだーっ！: E-yessssssssssss! So it wasn't just a dream!!

270417.「ハイ！ ハイ！ ジャンプさんの装甲を\n 一撃で 砕いた硬度と 不可思議な色…:
The hardness, the mysterious color...this
unknown material blasted through the Sky High
Umbrella's shield with a single blow!

270418.「私は ここで 失礼します！\n これは 世紀の新発見に なりますよ～っ！！:
Allow me to excuse myself! This will be the
new discovery of the century!!

270419.「エテーネの村を 旅立った あの日から……\n あなたが成しとげてきた すべてを:
From the day you left Ethene Village...I have
closely watched all of your accomplishments,
<pc>...

270420.「さきほどは 同胞が失礼いたしました。\n ご安心ください。私は あなたに\n:
I apologize about what my people did earlier.
Please rest assured that I mean to do you no
harm.

270421.「我が名は 導きの天使 ユーライザ。:
My name is Yuliza, and I am an Angel of
Guidance.

270422.「<pc>……。あなたこそが\n 異界滅神ジャゴヌバを 討伐せし\n 時渡りのチ:
You are the one who defeated Jagonuba and
possess the power of time travel...are you
not?<yesno><close>

270423.「天使を あざむくことは できませんよ。\n 長い長い間……我々は アストルティ:
You can't fool an angel. For eons, we have
been watching Astoltia from high up in the
sky.

270424.「あなたの これまでの行いは 称賛に値します。\n ……まさしく 英雄の名に\n:
Your past actions are nothing short of
commendable. I have no doubts that you are
worthy of being called a champion.

270425.「ならばこそ 私は あなたを……: And that's why I'm here. I want to...

270427.「今 この世界は 神々の守りを失った状態……\n あなたには 世界を守ることがで:
Now that this world has lost the protection of
the gods, we need you to obtain a great
power that can protect it.

270428.「ただし 偉大なるチカラへ 至る道には\n 厳しい試練が 待ち受けています。:
However...in order to obtain this great power,
rigorous trials will await you.

270429.「私は 導きの天使の役目ゆえ\n 試練を手助けすることは できませんが\n あな:
My role as an Angel of Guidance does not
allow me to help you during your trials, but
I have faith that you will overcome them.

270430.「……永きにわたる アストルティアの歴史に\n さんぜんと輝く きら星のごとき…:
Like the thousands of shining stars in
Astoltia's long history...the champions who
saved the world...

270431.「その中でも もっとも偉大な功績を挙げた者\n ……英雄の中の英雄である あなた:
Among them, the one who has achieved the
greatest of deeds...is you. You are the one
who deserves to obtain this power.

270432.「天星郷へ おいでなさい <pc>。\n 私たち 天使のもとで 試練を受け\n:
Come with me to the Firmament. Under the guidance of us angels, you shall undergo these trials and ascend to heights
you never thought possible.

270433.「まずは あなたに 選ばれし者の あかし……\n 魂の燭台を 授けましょう。:
First, I shall bestow upon you the attestation
of being the chosen one...
...the Soul Candelabra.

270434.<pc>は ユーライザから\n魂の燭台を 受け取った！:
<pc> received the Soul Candelabra
from Yuliza!

270435.「その 魂の燭台が あれば\n 私の仲間の天使たちに 攻撃されることは\n あり:
With that Soul Candelabra, my fellow angels
will no longer attack you.

270436.「天星郷で 偉大なるチカラへと\n 至るための試練が あなたを待っています。\n:
In the Firmament, a trial awaits that will
lead you to that great power. Now, please
pray to the Soul Candelabra...

270438.「ためらうことは ありません。\n さあ 魂の燭台に 祈りを捧げ\n はるか 天:
There is no need for hesitation. Now, pray
to the Soul Candelabra so that you may be led
to the Firmament.<yesno><close>

270441.「……怪我はないな。: No injuries, by the looks of it....

270442.「アストルティアの者か。\n もしや……: Are you from Astoltia? If so...

270443.「そなたも 魂の燭台を 持っているのか？<yesno><close>: Do you hold the Soul Candelabra as well?<yesno><close>

270445.しかし <pc>の 魂の燭台は\nどこにも見当たらない。どうやら\n墜落した時に:
But <pc>'s Soul Candelabra was
nowhere to be found. It seems it was lost
during their fall.

270446.<pc>は 自分の 魂の燭台を\n落としてしまったと 説明した！:
<pc> explained that they had lost
their Soul Candelabra!

270447.「……魂の燭台を 落としたのか。: So you're saying you lost it...

270448.「俺の名は ラダ・ガート。\n そなたの名は？: My name is Lada Gart. What is your name?

270449.「……そなえの場へ 向かうぞ。\n ついてこい <pc>。:
I'm headed to the Place of Preparation.
Follow me, <pc>.

270450.「ヘルヴェルという天使が 言っていた\n 戦士の儀礼場とは 下にある広場のことか:
That angel Helvel mentioned something called
the Court of Warriors in the area below?
...Hm?

270455.「……心配ない！\n 魂の燭台も 俺も 無事だ！:
...Don't worry! The candelabra and I are both
safe!

270456.「それより……\n やはり ここが 戦士の儀礼場のようだ。:
More importantly...this place seems to be
the Court of Warriors.

270457.「<pc>！ 崖を下りるのは 危ない！\n その先の 扉から\n 洞くつを通って:
It's not safe to climb down the cliff! Go
through the doorway up there and make your
way down through the cave!

270458.「コソコソ 隠れていないで\n 出てこい！！:
Enough with the sneaking around!
Show yourself!

270462.「今度は こちらから いかせてもらう！\n いざ……勝負っ！:
I won't allow you to best me this time!
Come on!!

270463.<center>四天の星巡りに 挑みし者たちよ\n汝らは 見事に おのれの強さを:
Those who challenge the Four Heavenly
Trials...you have shown me your strength.

270464.<center>白灰の試練場 戦士の儀礼の 守護者として\n汝らの勝利を 讃えよ:
As guardian of the White Ash Trial's Court of
Warriors, I commend you for your victory...

270466.「みな そなたの おかげだ\n <cs_pchero>。\n ……足を引っ張って:
It's all thanks to you that we were able
to overcome this. My apologies for dragging
you down...

270467.「昔……魔祖の血族と呼ばれる 厄介な連中と\n 戦ったことが あってな……。\n:
Long ago, I once fought against a troublesome
bunch known as the Demon Ancestors...
This scar was a result of that.

270468.「大事な時に限って こうして痛み\n いつまでも 己の愚かさを\n つきつけてく:
It's only during critical moments like this
that the pain resurfaces again, reminding me
of my own foolishness...

270469.「……すまん <cs_pchero>。\n このような話 退屈だったな。:
Sorry, <cs_pchero>. I don't mean
to bore you with my stories.

270470.「この場で なすべきことは\n すべて 片付けたようだ。\n いったん そなえの:
I think our business is finally finished
here. We should make our way back to the
Place of Preparation.

270471.<cs_pchero>と ラダ・ガートは\n戦士の儀礼場を 後にし\nそなえの場:
<cs_pchero> and Lada Gart left the Court
of Warriors and returned to the Place of
Preparation...

270472.「ヘルヴェルという天使は\n 天使たちの暮らす 神都フォーリオンから\n まだ:
It seems that angel Helvel hasn't returned
from Fourion yet. That's the celestial city
where the angels dwell.

270473.「魂の燭台を かかげれば 天使の都へ行ける。\n 俺は すでに 行ったことがある:
You can get there by holding up the Soul
Candelabra. I've already been there before,
so I think you should give it a try.

270475.「案ずるな 俺も いっしょに 行く。\n <pc>。\n 魂の燭台を かかげてみ:
I'll be going with you, so there's no need to
worry. Hold up the candelabra.<yesno><close>

270477.「……ここが 神都フォーリオンだ。 \n あいもかわらず いけすかん場所だ。:
This is Fourion, the celestial city. As
always, this place is unpredictable.

270478.「<pc>。\n ヘルヴェルは 中にいるはずだ。\n 行くぞ。: Helvel should be inside. Let's go.

270913.「おや……？\n キミも 天使たちに 捕まったのかい？\n ラダ・ガート。:
Well...if it isn't Lada Gart. Did the angels
catch you as well?

270914.「………ああ。お前もか フォステイル。\n 死んだ後まで こき使われるとはな。\:
Yeah...so you too, then, Fostail. I never
thought I'd have any use after my death, but
I intend to finish what I've started.

270915.「そうだ。こいつを 紹介しておこう。\n 白灰の試練場で 会った\n <pc>…:
Ah, right. Let me introduce you to this <if_woman>woman<else>man<endif>
here. We met at the White Ash Trials.
<pc> is their...

270916.「やあ……ひさしぶりだね。\n キミなら きっと 英雄のひとりとして\n 選ばれ:
Well, it has been some time, hasn't it? I
had no doubts you would be chosen as a
champion, <pc>.

270917.「そなたは 現代のアストルティアに\n 生を受けた者では なかったのか？\n 何:
Were you not born in the present day
Asoltia? Then how does he...?

270918.「さあ なぜだろうね？ ふふっ……。\n ご想像に おまかせするよ。\n ねえ:
How indeed? Hmm hmm... I'll just leave
that to your imagination.
Right, <pc>?

270919.「ただ者ではないと 感じていたが\n やはり そなたは\n フォステイルが 認め:
I had a feeling you were no ordinary person,
but to be someone that even Fostail approves
of as well...

270920.「偉大なる功績を 成しとげたる 英雄が\n 死を迎えしとき……導きの天使が舞い降:
When a champion dies after having accomplished
great deeds, an angel descends upon them to
guide them to the Firmament...

270921.「ただの伝説だと 思っていたけれど……\n 実際に この地で さまざまな時代の英:
I thought it was only a legend, but...after
actually meeting champions from differing time
periods, I knew it had to be true...

270922.「どうやら 無事に\n 最初の試練を 乗り越えたようだな。:
Seems to me that you were successful in your
first trial.

270923.「そりゃ ラダ・ガートが 一緒なんだ。\n うしろに くっついてりゃ カンタンだ:
It's only because Lada Gart was there to help.
I'm sure that made the trial easy.

270924.「クチを つつしめ アルビデ。\n この者たちが 試練を乗り越えたことは\n 審:
Quiet, Albide. As the Angel of Judgment, I
acknowledge that these two have passed their
trial.

270925.「だが……\n この者は 試練に挑む前に\n 魂の燭台を 紛失してしまった。:
But...one of you lost your Soul Candelabra
before you could even attempt it.

270926.「己のチカラで 魂の燭台を 見つけだし\n 白灰の試練を 乗り越えたようだが こ:
You commendably found your candelabra and overcame the trial with your own strength. However, this situation has the potential to
disrupt the Four Heavenly Trials' very foundation.

270927.「<pc>が\n 魂の燭台を なくした……！？\n まことですか ヘルヴェルお姉:
<pc> really lost their Soul
Candelabra...?! Is this true, Sister Helvel?!

270928.「公私は わきまえたまえ。ユーライザ。:
Be mindful of your public and private matters,
Yuliza.

270929.「……魂の燭台 紛失の件については\n 天使長に ご相談に うかがったが\n ご:
I went to the Archangel to inquire about the missing candelabra, but I was not able to reach them. Therefore, this matter is still
inconclusive...

270930.「天使長より ご判断が下るまで\n <pc>には 試練に挑まず\n 待機している:
I had instructed <pc> to stand by
and make no attempts at the trial until
the Archangel made a decision...

270931.「審判の天使に 待機を命じられていたなら\n そもそも 試練への挑戦権が ない。:
If ordered to stand by, then that means they
had no right to attempt the trial in the first
place. Wouldn't that disqualify them?

270932.「ユーライザの 強～い 推薦です。\n <pc>には 期待していたのですが\n:
<pc> was quiiiiite the strong
recommendation from Yuliza...so it's a bit
disappointing, isn't it?

270933.「待て！ 戦士の儀礼場の 謎かけは\n すべて <pc>が 解いてくれたのだ！\:
Wait! <pc> solved everything in
the Court of Warriors! I merely assisted!

270934.「戦士の儀礼場の 守護者との戦いでも\n 俺を かばってくれたのだ！\n すべて:
Against the court's guardian, <pc>
protected me! This is still their
accomplishment, is it not?!

270935.「さすが 英雄ラダ・ガートは 寛大だ。\n かような 不心得者を かばうとは！:
The champion Lada Gart is indeed generous,
covering for such an ignoramus!

270936.「少しばかり 調べたのですが……\n 我らが盟主 女神ルティアナ様を 死に\n:
I did a little research...and what I found is
that it was none other than <pc>
who caused the death of our beloved Lutiana.

270937.「ルティアナ様を 死に……！？\n それは まことなのですか！？:
Caused the death of Lutiana...?!
Is that really true?!

270938.「そうとも！ 偉大なる 大魔王\n <pc>殿は\n 女神ルティアナ様を 死なせ:
It is true! <pc>, the Demon Lord,
is the one behind the death of our
beloved Goddess!

270939.「幾度か 世界を救った者だとしても\n 我らが盟主を 犠牲にした者を\n 英雄と:
Sure they saved the world several times,
but how can we consider someone so foul
as a champion?!

270940.「たしかに……。\n 今 大人しくしているのは\n 巧妙な ワナかも しれないな:
Indeed...it could be that their silence is
part of some devious trick...

270941.「ルティアナ様を 死なせておいて\n よくも フォーリオンに やってこれましたね:
How dare you come to this city after letting
the great Lutiana die?! You should leave
this place, right now!

270942.「妄言も たいがいに なさい！\n 英雄の選定は 天使長様が 決めたことと\n:
Enough with the conspiracies! You know full
well that the selection of champions is
decided by the Archangel!

270944.「お見苦しいところを お見せして\n 申し訳ございません。\n ……天使長。:
My apologies for such unsightliness,
Archangel...

270945.<center>よい ヘルヴェル\n先刻の そなたからの報告……\n使いの者より:
It's fine, Helvel. I had heard your report
earlier from one of our messengers...

270947.<center>魂の燭台を なくしたというのに\n最初の試練を 乗り越えるとは\:
To overcome the first trial even after losing
your Soul Candelabra...that's quite the feat.

270948.<center>女神ルティアナをも しのぐ チカラの持ち主が\n四天の星巡りに:
To think one with the power to surpass Lutiana herself would challenge these trials... Helvel, I shall overlook the matter regarding
the Soul Candelabra.

270950.<center><pc> ラダ・ガート フォステイル\n……そなたら ３名を く:
Including the three of you, there are a total
of ten champions chosen for the Four Heavenly
Trials.

270951.<center>汝ら １０名が そろって\nすべての試練を 乗り越え\n私と ま:
I look forward to the day when all ten
champions have passed the trials, and can
speak with me face to face.

270952.「<pc>。\n 天使長の 寛大な措置に 感謝したまえ。\n それでは……:
You should be grateful of the Archangel's
generosity, <pc>.
Now then...

270953.「白灰の試練場を 乗り越えし ふたりに\n 私 審判の天使 ヘルヴェルが\n 祝:
To the two who have overcome the White Ash
Trial, I, Helvel, Angel of Judgment, shall
bestow my blessing upon you...

270954.<pc>が持つ\n魂の燭台に 炎が灯った！:
The Soul Candelabra that <pc> was
holding has been lit!

270955.「……これで 終わりではない。\n 貴公ら 英雄のために用意された 試練場は\n:
This is just the beginning...there are a total
of four trials prepared to test our champions.

270956.「その すべてを 乗り越えることが\n 四天の星巡りなのだ。:
Overcoming them all is the essence behind
the Four Heavenly Trials.

270957.「神都の外に おのおのの試練場へ 通じる\n ゲートがある。\n 残り ３つの試:
There are gates that lead to the corresponding
trial areas outside of the city. You'd do well
to challenge the remaining three.

270958.「ひとつ 試練を乗り越えるごとに\n 貴公らの魂は さらなる高みへと昇華する。:
With each trial you overcome, the potential of
your souls will soar to even greater heights.

270959.「試練を乗り越えた者には\n 審判の天使が 魂の燭台に 炎を灯す。\n そうして:
For each trial you overcome, I shall light one
of your candelabra's flames. Therefore, when
all four flames have been lit...

270960.「貴公らは 再び 天使長に 相まみえ\n 四天の星巡りの目的……この地へと導かれ:
You will again meet the Archangel and learn of
the Four Heavenly Trials' true purpose...
and the reason you were brought here.

270961.「その 四天の星巡りとやらは\n 残り ３つだそうだけど……\n どこから始めて:
So there are three trials left, but...
I can begin from any one of them that
I choose?

270963.「では 私は 先に行かせてもらうよ。\n ……ふたりとも また会おう。:
All right, then I'll go on ahead. I will see
the both of you again soon...

270964.「いまだ 生ある者を 英雄として招くのは\n 特例中の 特例。\n ユーライザの:
It's quite the special exception to allow a
mortal to become a champion. You were strongly
recommended by Yuliza here.

270965.「今後は いっそう 行いに気をつけたまえ。\n ユーライザの信頼を 裏切るならば:
In the future, you must be more mindful of
your actions. I will not forgive you should
you betray Yuliza's trust. Am I clear?

270967.「これは 始まりの１歩に すぎません。\n 続く ３つの試練は\n いっそう 厳:
This was only the first step of your trials.
The next three will be even tougher.

270968.「私は 貴方の 導きの天使。\n ……なればこそ 貴方の行く道を\n 輝かしき光:
I am your Angel of Guidance. I pray that a
radiant light illuminates your path
ahead...

270969.「俺も 次の試練へ 旅立つ。: I'm off to the next trial as well.

270970.「……白灰の試練場で 過ごした時間。\n 懐かしき友と 気ままに旅した\n あの:
Our time together during the White Ash
Trial...it reminded me of the days that I
traveled freely with my comrades.

270971.「そなたに 会えたこと 感謝している。\n ……<pc>。:
I am thankful to have met you,
<pc>...

270972.「すべての試練を 乗り越え また会おう。\n では さらばだ。:
Let us overcome all of the trials and meet
again. Farewell.

270973.「この場所は そなえの場……と\n 呼ばれているそうだ。:
This place is called...the Place of
Preparation, I believe.

270974.「……審判の天使よ！ 急用だ！！\n 出てこいっ！:
...Angel of Judgment! This is an urgent
matter! Come here!

270975.「みだりに 大声を 出さぬように。\n ラダ・ガート。:
There's no reason to raise your voice so
loudly, Lada Gart.

270977.「我が名は ヘルヴェル。\n ここ 白灰の試練場を 司る\n 審判の天使だ。:
My name is Helvel. I am the Angel of Judgment
who oversees the White Ash Trial.

270978.「見れば いまだ 人としての生を\n まっとうして いないようだが……。\n ど:
By the looks of it, it seems you have not yet
lived out a full life...so then, how did you
end up here?

270980.「ユーライザの 強い推薦で\n まだ 生きているのに 特例で召喚された\n ……:
They were summoned here on an exception by
Yuliza's strong recommendation...and they are
a Demon Lord.

270981.「……そうか。貴公が あの子の。: I see...so that's who that is.

270982.「特例とはいえ 英雄は 英雄。\n 白灰の試練場へ ようこそ。\n <pc>。:
Despite these circumstances, a champion is
still a champion. Welcome to the White Ash
Trial, <pc>.

270983.「救世の英雄である 貴公に\n これより 我らからの恩寵を 授けよう。:
You are the champion of our salvation.
And for that, you have our blessing.

270984.「四天の星巡りに 挑むがよい。: You must undergo the Four Heavenly Trials.

270985.「人智を超えた 偉大なるチカラを\n 手に入れることが できるのは\n 四天の星:
Only those who have overcome these
trials can receive a great power that
transcends mortal understanding.

270986.「この そなえの場にある 試みの門から出て\n 試みの荒野を たいまつに沿って:
If you leave through the gate and follow
the torches through the Wilderness of Trials,
you'll arrive at the Court of Warriors.

270987.「戦士の儀礼場の中央 試みの祭壇にて\n 試練を乗り越えよ。さすれば その魂の燭:
Survive the trial of the Altar of Trials in
the Court's center. If you succeed, your
Soul Candelabra will be lit as proof.

270988.「……そして <pc>。\n 貴公は いまだ 命ある身ゆえ\n アストルティアへ:
...and one more thing, <pc>.
Since you are technically still alive, you are
therefore allowed to return to Astoltia.

270989.「魂の燭台に 祈りを捧げれば\n 白灰の試練場と アストルティアを\n 自在に:
By praying to the Soul Candelabra, one may
travel between this trial and Astoltia as they
wish.

270990.「魂の燭台は 貴公らの命にも等しき\n 大切なものだ。\n ゆめゆめ 粗末に 扱:
That candelabra is as precious as your own
life. You would do well to take good care of
it.

270991.「お前たちを呼んだのは そのことだ。: That is the reason I called you here.

270992.「<pc>は ここに 来る途中で\n 魂の燭台を なくしたらしい。:
<pc> told me that they had lost
their Soul Candelabra on their way here.

270993.「魂の燭台が 試練に 欠かせぬというなら\n こいつに 新しいのを やってくれ。:
If it is essential to completing this trial,
then I think you should give them a new
one.

270994.「魂の燭台を なくしただと！？\n しかも 魔族の首領だっていうじゃないか！\n:
You lost your Soul Candelabra?! Not to mention
you are the leader of the demons?! How could
such a foul person be a champion?!

270995.「ガートラント王国 建国の祖 ラダ・ガートは\n ともかく……。\n あんなヤツ:
Regardless if they're with Gartlant's
founder... Can we still really call them a
champion?

270997.「……なるほど。\n つまり 到着時に 事故があったのだな。\n 同胞たちの暴言:
I see...it seems there was some kind of
incident before your arrival. Pardon their
sudden outburst.

270998.「されど 魂の燭台は 聖なる神具。\n なくしたからといって おいそれと\n 代:
However, the Soul Candelabra is a sacred
relic. I cannot simply replace it just because
you lost it.

270999.「私は フォーリオンへ戻り このことを\n 天使長に 報告してこよう。\n 試練:
I shall return to Fourion and report this to
the Archangel. Lada Gart alone shall be
responsible for the trials.

271002.「そなたは まだ 生きている……\n というのは 本当か？\n <pc>。<ye:
Is what she said true? Are you really still
alive?<yesno><close>

271003.「……ウソを つくな <pc>。\n そなたから感じる みずみずしい気は\n ま:
Do not lie to me, <pc>. The fresh
energy that I sense from you no doubt belongs
to those who still draw breath.

271004.「うすうす カンづいて いるだろうが\n 俺は すでに 死んだ身だ。:
I'm sure you've noticed, but I have already
died.

271005.「ガートラントで 生涯を終えた 俺の前に\n 導きの天使が 現れ……魂だけを こ:
After a lifetime in Gartlant, an angel
appeared to me and guided my soul to this
place...and thus, I took on a new body.

271006.「死者である俺には 他に 行くところがない。\n しかし <pc> まだ生きてい:
As someone who's dead, I've nowhere left to
go. But you are still alive, so the same
cannot be said of you.

271007.「俺の 魂の燭台を 貸してやる。: I will lend you my Soul Candelabra.

271008.「これを使えば アストルティアへ帰れるはずだ。\n その 魂の燭台を 好きに使え:
This will allow you to return to Astoltia.
Please use it as you like.

271009.<pc>は\nラダ・ガートの魂の燭台を 貸してもらった！:
<pc> was lent Lada Gart's Soul
Candelabra!

271010.「俺は 四天の星巡りを続けるつもりだ。\n もしも そなたが……:
I intend to continue on with the Four Heavenly
Trials. However, if you were to...

271012.「もしも そなたも 試練に挑むならば\n 魂の燭台を 探しださねばならん。\n:
If you too wish to take part, you must find
your candelabra... Meet me at the gate
ahead.

274562.お店などでも買えるもの\nモほろのてりすり １\nくんてん十こモで １:
Purchasable in Stores, etc.
M#g1c W@t3r (1)
Fr33-R4nge 3gg$ (1)

286037.ラダ・ガートと名乗る人物は\nそなえの場という所へ 向かったようだ。\nラダ・ガ:
A man named Lada Gart has gone ahead to a
place called...the Place of Preparation. You
should follow him there.
